summary: Biocatalysis offers high activity, selectivity, and efficiency for organic synthesis due to precise control within enzymes. Enzyme engineering enhances this process by adapting catalysts to specific reactions.
key_claims: Enzymes provide high activity and selectivity in biotransformations.
Enzyme engineering allows adaptation of catalysts to desired reactions.

enzymes: peptide chain of 200-600 amino acids, molecular weight between 20 and 60 kDa
